mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notificationboard (member_id, notb_title, notb_content) values(1, #{notbTitle}, #{notbContent})
mapper.select: select n.notb_id, n.notb_title, m.member_name, n.notb_date from tbl_member m join tbl_notificationboard n on m.member_id = n.member_id order by n.notb_id desc limit #{offset}, #{rowCount}
